channel.title: [pi] if your having trouble with animations going on forever
channel.description:
to fix this problem i will give a hint search google for homeTeleDelay
a tut will come out... now from this tut you can set animations....
the rest is up to you out figure out...
*fyi* this isnt realy a tut more of a point in rigt direction no forum for this i believe
edit also the method c.frame1(). is a big help
edit that tut is also how u fix firemaking =)

item.title: [pi] if your having trouble with animations going on forever

item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

i added a fast throw together of the skill so people atleast have a better looking firemaking skill form there they can evolve it.

edit* atleast its not that crappy sit in one spot and do animation forever skill anymore

Read full topic
